title: Coronation Street spoilers: Dying Sinead discovers Daniel and Bethany's betrayal
text:
Sinead Tinker (Katie McGlynn) has had more than enough heartache in Coronation Street as of late, but — with her impending death looming — Daniel Osbourne (Rob Mallard) struggles to cope and seeks comfort in Bethany Platt (Lucy Fallon) once more — something which Sinead discovers in the coming episodes.

Kirk (Andrew Whyment), Beth (Lisa George) and Craig (Colson Smith) throw an early Christmas so that Sinead can spend one last festive season with her family. However, Daniel’s over-protectiveness of his wife proves problematic, and tensions are risen as a result.

Later, Bethany stumbles upon an upset Daniel, and he proceeds to open up about his fears — and how he wishes he could change the situation that both he and Sinead have found themselves in — before breaking down in her arms. Bethany embraces him — but what exactly will transpire?

Ken (William Roache) spots the two of them together, and he’s fuming as a result. He orders Daniel to go return home to his dying wife, and Bethany heads off in tears — mortified by what has transpired.

Later in the week, Sinead reaches for her notebook, but she soon realises that the notebook in her possession is actually Bethany’s. Curious, she opens it up and begins to read. Upon Daniel’s return, Sinead reveals that she’s read Bethany’s short story, and that it’s clear she’s in love with him.

A worried Daniel tries to deny such a claim, but Sinead’s not convinced by what he has to say and, as a result, she begs him to be honest with her.

Daniel comes clean and reveals all about the moment he shared with Bethany, before swearing that it meant nothing. However, she can’t bear to look at him afterwards.

Is this the end of their relationship?

One to watch: Wednesday 23rd October at 8:30pm on ITV.
